title: "The Assassin Is Unstoppable" - A Guide to Rogues
itunes:title: "The Assassin Is Unstoppable" - A Guide to Rogues
description:
Today we're taking a deep-dive into one of the most infamous classes, where many a player tends to start, the Rogue! We'll each be breaking down our favourite Roguish Archetype and even sneaking in some Rogue role-playing pointers.


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

Theme Music by Jonathan Charles

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today we're taking a deep-dive into one of the most infamous classes, where many a player tends to start, the Rogue! We'll each be breaking down our favourite Roguish Archetype and even sneaking in some Rogue role-playing pointers.
